content.content:
You are given three images, one is called target and the other two are distractors.
Your task is to generate a referring expression that best describes the target image while distinguishing it from the two other distractor images.
The first image is the target, the second image is a distractor, and the third image is a distractor. Instruction: Describe the target image. Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target image. Omit any other text.

action.content:
<start of description>
The image displays a chessboard-like arrangement with a grid composed of squares. It appears to be a simplified or abstract representation of a chessboard without any pieces on it. The grid has alternating white and black rectangles, and two distinct patterns are visible. The upper pattern consists of a solid X made of four interconnected squares, one in each of the corners of the grid. The background beneath this pattern has a darker tone than the other areas. The lower pattern is made up of several smaller X shapes distributed across the lower half of the grid, with these smaller X marks also having a slightly darker shade than the other squares. Each X is composed of two intersecting diagonal lines. There are no other objects or text in
